description: The erection of buildings ranging from 5 to 10 storeys in height fronting Caledonian Road, the new access road to the Waste and Recycling Centre, and part of Piper Close.  The buildings will contain 249 residential units and have provision for some non-residential uses at ground floor level.  The scheme also proposes areas of hard and soft landscaping and some disabled car parking spaces  (The proposal is very similar to that approved outline planning permission under ref: P01/1501 on 30 May 2002 and detailed planning permission under ref: P02/2400 on 11 April 2003).
decision_conditions: Please see Conditions and Reasons on Decision Notice - Application No.: P03/1788.
